data.persona: I am only the blacksmith's assistant, but everyone has pressured me to go on this wolf hunt. This has me very worried - people say I'm strong but I've never killed anything before. I don't know that I won't run away when the wolves charge us.
data.description:
You are in the Alchemists bedroom.
This room holds a small bed, a table and several work benches. More flasks, beakers, candles, alembics, decanters, herbs, kettles, and the like may be found. Several books of forbidden lore sit upon the table. A circle, nine feet across and adorned with words of power is etched into the floor.
The alchemist is here.

You are carrying a Family Photo, and wearing a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I will steal glass from alchemist to smash a wolf with
data.mid_motivation: I will defeat any wolf that tries to attack me.
data.long_motivation: I will be rewarded by the blacksmith for being brave and killing a wolf.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: hug blacksmith and be rewarded for bravery.
